name.description: Unique identifier representing a fabric.

coupon_client.description: Coupon is ordered by client, required if coupon = true

coupon_vendor.description: Vendor for fabric, required if coupon = true

type.description: Fabric type : Plain|Stripes|Check, required if coupon = true

coupon_deliverydate.description: Delivery date for fabric if coupon provided by client

name.description: Unique identifier representing a fabric.

Shoulder_line.description: Jacket Shoulder slope  (id=VShSlope; lbl=SHOULDER LINE; param=VShSlope)

sleeve_head_name.description: Jacket Sleeve Head name  (id=VcapManeca; lbl=SLEEVE HEAD; param=capmaneca)

front_name.description: Jacket Front name (id=Vmodel; lbl=FRONT; param=Vmodel si modele)

default.description: main lining  (id=VdoublA; lbl=MAIN LINING - A; param=doublure_a)
sleeve lining  (id=VdoublA; lbl=SLEEVE LINING - B; param=doublure_b)

buttons_name.description: Jacket Buttons type name  (id=Vnasturi; lbl=BUTTONS; param=boutons)

collar_felt_name.description: Jacket Collar Felt type name  (id=Vguler; lbl=COLLAR FELT; param=feutre)

bow_tie_fabric_ref_name.description: Bow tie frabic reference  (id=PpcodTesatura; lbl=BOWTIE FABRIC REF; param=tissu_papion)

sleeve_length_left_size.description: sleeve length left size  (id=VlungimeManecaStanga; lbl=SLEEVE LENGTH / LEFT; param=manche_gauche)

sleeve_length_right_size.description: sleeve right left size  (id=VlungimeManecaDreapta; lbl=SLEEVE LENGTH / RIGHT; param=manche_droite)
